title: iPhone maker Apple to bombard with new products starting 2025; if you are an Apple fan, here is the exciti - The Economic Times
summary:
Exciting New Apple Products Launching in 2025

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Economic Times

Apple is set to unveil a range of innovative products starting in 2025, generating buzz among fans and tech enthusiasts. The upcoming lineup includes updates to existing devices as well as new product categories aimed at diversifying revenue streams.

Key Upcoming Products

  • iPhone SE Refresh: Featuring a 6.1-inch OLED display for a budget-friendly option.
  • Thinner iPhones: Development of lighter iPhone models with improved performance.
  • Foldable iPhones: Prototypes of foldable phones aimed at versatility.
  • New Mac Computers: Introduction of lighter MacBook models with powerful M-series chips.
  • Apple Watch Updates: New health monitoring features and possibly a rugged version.
  • Enhanced AirPods: New tiers of AirPods 4 with advanced AI features.
  • Apple TV+ Content Expansion: Investments in original content for streaming.
  • Augmented Reality (AR) Headset: A rumored headset that could transform user interaction with digital content.
  • Smart Home Products: Expansion of the smart home ecosystem with new HomePod models.

Challenges Ahead

Apple faces significant engineering challenges in developing foldable phones and entering augmented reality markets. Maintaining quality across diverse products will be crucial for success.

This upcoming product lineup emphasizes Apple's commitment to innovation and its strategy to stay competitive in a rapidly changing tech landscape.
newTitle: Exciting New Apple Products Launching in 2025

title: Not everything is perfect with Apple: Its AI tool Apple Intelligence messes up big time, generates false - The Economic Times
summary:
Apple's AI Tool Generates False News Alert: What Happened?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Economic Times

Tech giant Apple is under scrutiny following an incident where its AI service, Apple Intelligence, generated a misleading alert claiming that murder suspect Luigi Mangione had shot himself. The notification has raised concerns about the reliability of AI in news delivery.

The False Alert: What Happened?

BBC subscribers in the UK received a notification stating, “Luigi Mangione shoots himself,” which was incorrect as he is currently in custody awaiting extradition.

How Apple Intelligence Got It Wrong

The AI service misinterpreted news context, leading to the erroneous alert. The BBC clarified that they had not published such information and contacted Apple about the issue.

Apple’s Response and Concerns

A company representative acknowledged concerns about the potential harm to credibility of both Apple and news organizations, highlighting past errors with AI summaries.

The Case of Luigi Mangione and Its Media Sensitivity

Luigi Mangione is charged with the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, making the error particularly sensitive and potentially damaging to public trust in news.

“We take our credibility very seriously,” the BBC spokesperson emphasized.
newTitle: Apple's AI Tool Generates False News Alert: What Happened?

title: Pixel 10 reportedly using MediaTek modem as Google strives for better battery & heat - 9to5Google
summary:
Pixel 10 Reportedly Using MediaTek Modem for Improved Battery and Thermal Performance

Publication Date: November 8, 2024   Source: 9to5Google

Google is set to enhance the performance of its upcoming Pixel 10 by incorporating a new MediaTek modem, departing from the previous Samsung modem which faced issues with heating and signal strength.

  • The Pixel 10 will utilize the MediaTek T900 modem, based on the unreleased “M85” generation.
  • Previous Pixel models faced overheating issues stemming from the Samsung modem.
  • Google has acknowledged that modem performance has led to higher return rates for Pixel phones.
  • MediaTek’s modem is anticipated to improve efficiency and battery life, although performance comparisons to Qualcomm's modems are yet undisclosed.
“Tensor overheating problems have been the single biggest reason for people returning Pixel phones.”

The shift to a MediaTek modem reflects Google's focus on improving user satisfaction by addressing performance shortcomings in the Pixel line.
newTitle: Pixel 10 Reportedly Using MediaTek Modem for Improved Battery and Thermal Performance

OpenAI Introduces Video Interaction Features for ChatGPT Users

Date: December 2024

Source: India TV News

OpenAI continues to elevate ChatGPT’s capabilities by introducing several new features that redefine user interaction with the AI. The platform now incorporates video recognition and real-time interaction, enhancing how users engage with the generative AI chatbot.

Key Points:

  • ChatGPT can recognize objects via camera input and provide instant insights.
  • Features are rolling out for ChatGPT Plus and Pro users in December, with a later launch for enterprise and educational sectors expected by January 2025.
  • Sora Turbo allows users to create ultra-realistic videos from text prompts, available for Plus and Pro users worldwide.
  • Sora Turbo features include adjustable video length, various formats, customization options, and a community showcase for trending creations.
  • Regulatory constraints keep Sora Turbo from being available in the UK, EU, and Switzerland.

Notable Quotes:

“These updates are part of OpenAI’s 12-day product launch series, which aims to democratize access to advanced AI technologies.”

Conclusion:

OpenAI’s latest features in ChatGPT enhance user interaction through significant advancements in video processing and creation, catering to a broader audience while aiming for future accessibility.

title: I switched from Android to iOS and these are the 5 things I miss the most - Android Police
summary:
What I Miss About Android After Switching to iPhone

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The article discusses the author's transition from Android to iPhone, highlighting several features and conveniences that are missed from the Android experience.

  • The keyboard experience on iPhone is laggy and lacks features such as a clipboard manager.
  • Charging speeds on iPhone are slower compared to fast-charging Android counterparts.
  • The iPhone feels slower in user interface interactions compared to Android.
  • The customization options available on Android, particularly the ability to install custom ROMs, are missed.
  • Several little usability features and intuitive gestures that Android offers are not present in iOS, causing frustration.
"If the iOS 18 Photos app redesign wasn't controversial enough, the way your photos and videos go into a single Recents folder in your gallery is annoying."

The author's reluctance to switch back to Android is influenced by their investment in Apple's ecosystem, despite the frustrations experienced with iOS.
newTitle: What I Miss About Android After Switching to iPhone

summary:

Publication Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: Sammy Fans

The upcoming Galaxy S25 smartphone from Samsung is anticipated to lack several major features that could impact consumer choice and market response.

  • 1. Advanced display technology: S25 to use older M13 OLED technology instead of the latest M14.
  • 2. Outdated memory configuration: Base model will have only 128GB storage, a low capacity for 2025.
  • 3. Primary Camera: Will use the same 50-megapixel sensor as previous models.
  • 4. Zoom Camera: Sticking to a conventional 10MP sensor that supports 3x optical zoom.
  • 5. Fast Charging: No 45W fast charging available for the base model.
  • 6. Lack of UWB: No ultra-wideband technology for advanced features.
“These are the rumored features that the vanilla Galaxy S25 would lack...”

The Galaxy S25 series is expected to retain pricing similar to its predecessor, potentially making it a competitive option despite missing features.

title: Apple iPhone 17 Air Has Reportedly Gone Under Mass Production, Here's What We Know - ABP Live
summary:
Apple iPhone 17 Air Enters Mass Production Phase

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Macrumors

Image with Caption:

No image available.

Apple's much talked about next iPhone, the iPhone 17 Air, has reportedly entered the New Product Introduction (NPI) phase at Foxconn. This model is expected to replace the 'Plus' variant in the iPhone 17 lineup and is set to be released in 2025.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is anticipated to be Apple's slimmest smartphone yet, with thickness ranging between 5mm and 6mm.
  • Prototypes suggest the elimination of the physical SIM card tray in favor of eSIM technology.
  • It may feature a centralized camera bump on the back, potentially with a single sensor instead of a dual-camera system.
  • Rumors indicate a reduction in battery capacity due to the slimmer design.
  • Audio setup may include only a single speaker in the earpiece.
“The NPI phase takes a product from the concept stage to mass production.”

In conclusion, while there are promising innovations with the iPhone 17 Air, there are also trade-offs regarding features and specifications compared to previous models.
newTitle: Apple iPhone 17 Air Enters Mass Production Phase

title: How to plan the perfect serve for a house party | Mint - Mint
summary:
How to plan the perfect serve for a house party

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

In bartending lexicon, the perfect serve is the ultimate cocktail experience defined by various parameters such as ingredients, temperature, glassware, and technique.

  • The classic Old Fashioned serves best in a rocks glass at 7-10 degrees Celsius.
  • Chill the glass with ice water and use large ice cubes to minimize dilution.
  • Neil Alexander, a beverage consultant, emphasizes the importance of garnishes like fresh orange peel for enhancing flavor.
  • Proper technique is crucial: shake cocktails with juices, stir spirit-forward drinks, and pour gently for layered drinks.
“Knowing that you should shake, not stir cocktails which have juices or creams in them and vice versa for the spirit-forward drinks; pouring gently over the back of a spoon to maintain distinct layers.” - Neil Alexander

This article provides insights into how hobbyists can recreate the bar experience at home while emphasizing the importance of technique and presentation.
newTitle: How to Plan the Perfect Serve for a House Party

title: How to redeem 100 GB free storage on JioCloud - The Indian Express
summary:
How to redeem 100 GB free storage on JioCloud

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Indian Express

First announced at Reliance’s 47th annual general meeting (AGM), Jio has started to roll out 100 GB of cloud storage to all its customers––free of cost––as a part of the Jio AI Cloud Welcome offer. Jio prepaid and postpaid users can now use 100 GB of cloud storage along with a host of AI features via the JioCloud app, available for Android and iOS devices, and also on the web.

  • JioCloud upgraded from 5 GB to 100 GB of free storage under the welcome offer.
  • The service is temporarily free, with potential future subscription fees.
  • Compared to competitors like Google Drive, Apple iCloud, and Microsoft OneDrive, JioCloud offers a significantly larger free storage option.
  • The JioCloud app includes features for storing various types of digital content and provides access to DigiLocker for government documents.
  • JioCloud features native AI tools, including an AI document scanner and background remover.
For 100 GB cloud storage, Google charges Rs 130 per month or Rs 1,300 per year. Apple charges Rs 219 per month for 200 GB of cloud storage.

This offer gives JioCloud a competitive edge in the Indian cloud storage market, but future charges may affect user decisions to adopt the service.
newTitle: How to Redeem 100 GB Free Storage on JioCloud

title: YouTube lets you watch videos in preferred languages: Here's how - NewsBytes
summary:
YouTube lets you watch videos in preferred languages: Here's how

Published on: Not specified Source: NewsBytesApp

YouTube has introduced a new feature allowing users to watch select videos in their preferred languages, enhancing accessibility and user experience.

  • YouTube automatically defaults to users' preferred language but allows manual changes.
  • To change language on the web, access 'Settings' in the video player and select 'Audio track.'
  • For mobile, navigate to 'Settings' -> 'Additional settings' -> 'Audio.'
  • The feature enhances multilingual video search and personalized recommendations.
“The service is aimed at enhancing user experience by catering to their linguistic preferences.”

This new feature enhances accessibility and personalization on YouTube, making it easier for users to interact with content in their preferred languages.
newTitle: YouTube Enhances Language Features for Video Viewing

Date: December 15, 2024 | Source: India TV News

Realme is preparing to launch its latest mid-range smartphone, the Realme 14x 5G, in India on December 18. This device is notable for its massive 6000mAh battery and an IP69 rating, targeting the budget smartphone segment.

  • The launch date is set for December 18.

  • It will come in three RAM variants, with the highest being 8GB RAM and 256GB storage.
